name: Brother's Curse
description:
PLAY WITH FRIENDS USING PARSEC: https://parsec.app/

Two explorer brothers were caught by a weird and misterious witch who transformed them into pigs.

Your mision: find little potions to decelerate your transformation until you find the final one which returns you to your human state. Use your environment and objects to solve the maze on time!

As brothers, you will have to cooperate for winning the game.

Controllers:

  • Two players with one keyboard -> NOT WORKING YET
  • One player keyboard other with gamepad
  • Two players with gamepad
  • You can interact with buttons and some objects of the enviroment.
  • Inventory system where save objects you find in the maze.
  • An object selected in the inventory can be used for the player, With USE button or can be THROW to your mate.
  • Use potions for encreasy your health bar. You won't be a pig forever!
